mapper.insert: insert into STORES (CITY_CODE, STORE_NAME, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE,VIEWS,CREATED_DATE) VALUES (DEFAULT ,#{city_code},#{store_name},#{category},#{address},#{latitude},#{longitude},0,now())
mapper.select: select * from stores order by views desc limit 10;
mapper.update: update stores set views=views+1 where store_id=#{storeID}
mapper.select: select * from likes join stores on likes.store_id = stores.store_id where likes.user_id = #{userID}

select s.store_id,s.city_code,s.store_name,s.category,s.address,s.latitude,s.longitude,s.views,s.created_date , earth_distance(ll_to_earth(s.latitude,s.longitude),ll_to_earth(u.latitude,u.longitude)) as distance from stores s, users u where earth_distance(ll_to_earth(s.latitude,s.longitude),ll_to_earth(u.latitude,u.longitude)) < #{distance} and u.user_id = #{param2} and s.category='${category}'

select s.store_id,s.city_code,s.store_name,s.category,s.address,s.latitude,s.longitude,s.views,s.created_date, earth_distance(ll_to_earth(s.latitude,s.longitude),ll_to_earth(u.latitude,u.longitude)) as distance from stores s, users u where u.user_id = #{userID} and power(8800*abs(s.latitude-u.latitude),2)+power(111000*abs(s.longitude-u.longitude),2)< #{distance} and (s.category like '%${keyword}%' or s.store_name like '%${keyword}%' or s.address like '%${keyword}%')

select s.store_id,s.city_code,s.store_name,s.category,s.address,s.latitude,s.longitude,s.views,s.created_date, earth_distance(ll_to_earth(s.latitude,s.longitude),ll_to_earth(u.latitude,u.longitude)) as distance from stores s, users u where u.user_id=#{userID} and city_code=#{city_code} and (category like '%${keyword}%' or store_name like '%${keyword}%' or address like '%${keyword}%')

select s.store_id,s.city_code,s.store_name,s.category,s.address,s.latitude,s.longitude,s.views,s.created_date, earth_distance(ll_to_earth(s.latitude,s.longitude),ll_to_earth(u.latitude,u.longitude)) as distance from stores s, users u where u.user_id=#{userID} and earth_distance(ll_to_earth(s.latitude,s.longitude),ll_to_earth(u.latitude,u.longitude))< 2000 order by views desc limit 10

select s.store_id, s.store_name,l.like_num from store s join ( select store_id, count(store_id) as like_num from likes group by store_id) l on s.store_id = l.store_id where earth_distance(ll_to_earth(s.latitude,s.longitude),ll_to_earth(u.latitude,u.longitude))< 2000 order by l.like_num desc limit 10
mapper.delete: delete from likes where store_id=#{storeID} and user_id=#{userID}
mapper.select: select EXISTS (select * from users where email=#{email} and password=#{password}) as isExisted;
mapper.update: update users set username=#{user_name}, email=#{email}, password=#{password}, phone_number=#{phone_number}, latitude=#{latitude}, longitude=#{longitude} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete from users where user_id=#{user_id} and password=#{password}
